name: Tottris (For Copyright Reasons)
description:
My first game that I created in DragonRuby with the help of a tutorial! (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xZMwRSbC4rY)

There is still ONE bug, but I will hopefully squash it shortly.

Narrator:  There were in fact Three bugs.  All of which were squashed.

Apart from the fact that the in browser feature fails to play... :/
